ValidationRule.description: Disqualified leads must have a reason
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ( $Profile.Name='Marketing User'), ($Profile.Name='Read Only'), ($Profile.Name='Solution Manager'), ($Profile.Name='Standard User'), ($Profile.Name='Xometry Sales User'), ( $Profile.Name='Xometry Service User'), ( $Profile.Name='Xometry Sales Leadership') ), and(ispickval(Status, 'Closed Not Converted'),ispickval(Lead_Not_Converted_Reason__c,'')))
&& !$Permission.Ignore_All_VR && !$Permission.Ignore_Lead_VR
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Lead Status: Closed Not Converted must have a Lead Not Converted Reason
